pages.text: $(li)The Snowy Mountains is a variant of the $(l:patchouli:biomes/overworld/grass/mountains)Mountains$(/l).$(br)$(li)It can be found in the Overworld.$(br)$(li)This biome is composed mostly of Stone, Dirt and, snow layers convering the whole area.

$(li)You can find some vegetation here like Spruce and Oak trees here.$(br)$(li)You can search this biome by typing the words $(l)Snowy Mountains$() in the search box of the $(l:patchouli:perks/natures_compass)Nature's Compass$(/l).
